data.prayer: Jesus, defend your people in the state of Camarines Norte against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Camarines Norte, Philippines
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Camarines Norte, Philippines by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Camarines Norte, Philippines to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 265,010 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Camarines Norte, Philippines.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Maguindanao people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Camarines Norte, Philippines.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Camarines Norte, Philippines need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.section_summary:
the state of Camarines Norte, Philippines has a population of 307,900.

We estimate Camarines Norte has 42,890 people who might know Jesus, 237,192 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 27,818 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 7 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 42,890 believers in Camarines Norte.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me
